title: MOOC Platform User Experience Analysis: Mobile Analytics and Deep Learning-Based Evaluation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience operating online learning platforms and foundational knowledge of data analysis
context.additional_context: A course for corporate MOOC platform administrators to enhance user feedback analysis capabilities.

learning_goals: Systematic analysis of user behavior data on MOOC platforms can be conducted using mobile analytics tools
Sentiment analysis of user reviews can be performed by applying deep learning-based text analysis models
UX improvement strategies for MOOC platforms can be established and prioritized based on analytical results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
